body_html:
Similar semantics as in numpy? The result of comparison operators return bool instead of byte, a bunch of math operations are not supported in book (only logical operations)?
I'm not sure if there is a strong case for it though...

body:
Similar semantics as in numpy? The result of comparison operators return bool instead of byte, a bunch of math operations are not supported in book (only logical operations)?
I'm not sure if there is a strong case for it though...
